title: Earthquakes and volcanoes. - Rev. ed.
brief_description: This film demonstrates how volcanoes and earthquakes occur in the same place in certain regions of the world. It suggests that they have a common cause: the friction and collision between the plates in motion which cover the earth’s surface. Suitable for secondary level.
